title: Superman Inspired Encino Man: YouTube Geek Week
description:
Superman crashed into Missouri and hung out in an ice block for 10,000 years. See, Colin doesn't like comics, but he loves driving Greg crazy. For YouTube Geek Week, Colin's butchering one classic comic book origin in each video and watching Greg cringe.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Watch the other Horribly Wrong Comic Book Origins: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVtoTPsBvu65SG52bZzPVn41

Watch more YouTube Geek Week videos at http://youtube.com/geekweek

Animations by the AMAZING PandaMusk -- follow his antics at http://www.youtube.com/pandamusk and http://www.twitter.com/pandamusk.

Shot on location at Isotope Comics in San Francisco. Go there, and tell James "Horribly Wrong Comic Book Origins sent me!" - http://www.isotopecomics.com/ 

Follow us on Twitter:
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/notaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/nickscarpino
